column4: how do I change what program starts up when I say... plug in my ipod?
The April issue of Linux Magazine has a pretty nice write-up on getting the full iPod experience on a Linux box.
i have it all set up and i'm using it and all, but rythmbox keeps poping up when i plug the ipod in, and its annoying :)
I wonder if it's in the Gnome "preferred applications" setup?
But, to be honest, I don't use any audio apps on my Linux machine.
